name: Good, Occasionally Poor
description:
Good, Occasionally Poor

A hebridean fisherman battles the elements to catch tasty fish.

Created in two weeks for ZEN JAM 03.

Credits

A game by Jack McAuley (audio), Matthew Trew (programming) and Ottilia Westerlund (art and programming)
